title: Financial Services
description: The financial Services sector encompasses institutions that are pivotal facilitators of investment and insurance services. It contains commercial banks, microfinance institutions, insurance companies, and other financial institutions.

title: Energy and Connectivity
description: The Energy and Connectivity sector contains companies that focus on expanding access to electricity, improving connectivity, and fostering innovation. It includes companies that work on telecommunications, energy and technology.

title: Transport and Logistics
description: The transport and logistics sector contains companies that play a pivotal role in facilitating domestic and international trade. It contains transportation companies and logitstics companies.

title: Manufacturing
description: The manufacturing sector contains companies leveraging Ethiopia's abundant natural resources, cost-effective utilities, and available labor force, for sustainable and accelerated growth.
